body:
Nicole, 

Please read the [Installation Instructions](https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/ladybug/blob/master/resources/Installation_Instructions.md), (Install Radiance to C:\Radiance)!.



For default folder set the "C:\Ladybug" it's enough for both of them.

You can also change your username with no white space (best solution).



Best,

-Omid.
